snippet.title: Animal Lover Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming Soon!

Evil forces have turned these five hunky beefcake time-displaced boys into animals! You've got to help cure them and maybe even fall in love! Mystery! Intrigue! Romance! No furries, despite the title! A dating sim by Wilson Taylor, Maia Gross and Travis Tohill.

Follow us on Facebook, Tumblr, Kickstarter and Steam Greenlight!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Animal-Lover-1512633312311691/

Tumblr: http://www.animalloverdev.tumblr.com

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2009068242/animal-lover-an-american-dating-sim

Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=384943027
